definition: (of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
certificate/proof/to prove/to demonstrate/to confirm/variant of 症[zheng4]

sentences.english: I got a marriage certificate on my wall.
sentences.chinese: 我得到的結婚證書對我的牆。

sentences.english: The pastor showed the marriage certificate to all of the guests.
sentences.chinese: 牧師向所有來賓展示了他們的結婚證書。

sentences.english: The "newlyweds" also received marriage certificates.(See photo)
sentences.chinese: 狗狗們還領取到了寵物結婚證書。

sentences.english: When they got a divorce, their marriage certificate became null and void.
sentences.chinese: 當他們離婚，結婚證書就會失效。

sentences.english: For example, in most states, marriage licenses are issued by city or county governments.
sentences.chinese: 例如，在大多數州，結婚證書是由縣或市政府簽發。

sentences.english: Marriage certificate just, need to make like "citing" so thick?
sentences.chinese: 結婚證而已，需要搞得像《辭海》這樣厚嗎？

sentences.english: The fake marriage license turned to ashes in seconds.
sentences.chinese: 假結婚證幾秒鐘就化爲灰燼。

sentences.english: They received their official marriage certificate on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五他們辦了結婚證。

sentences.english: On a typical day the office processes 10 licenses, court officials said.
sentences.chinese: 法院工作人員表示，一般一天能辦出10本結婚證。

sentences.english: A man to a woman's best love letters, is the marriage certificate.
sentences.chinese: 一個男人給一個女人最好的情書，就是結婚證書。

sentences.english: My wife-to-be and I were at the county clerk's office for our marriage license.
sentences.chinese: 我和未婚妻在縣辦公室領結婚證。

sentences.english: Pan Long thinks the marriage certificate is a piece of paper only, two people love each other than what actual.
sentences.chinese: 潘龍認爲結婚證只是一張紙，兩人相愛比什麼都實際。

sentences.english: The husband and wife relationship shall be established as soon as they acquire the marriage certificates.
sentences.chinese: 取得結婚證，即確立夫妻關係。

sentences.english: In New York City 823 same sex couples were granted licenses to marry on Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 紐約市在週日授予八百二十三對同性伴侶結婚證書。

sentences.english: Last year the office issued 122, 259 marriage licenses.
sentences.chinese: 去年，該婚姻登記處共辦理了122259張結婚證。

sentences.english: You've been reading our marriage certificate foran hour.
sentences.chinese: 你看著我們的結婚證書，足足有一小時了。

definition: identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
(Tw) to be in the care of one's relatives/to be dependent on a relative/to draw on family connections
to become invalid/to cancel/to delete/to nullify
to transfer ownership (of a vehicle, securities etc)/(real estate) conveyancing
